Effect.en: If you control a Level 8 or higher Synchro Monster: Banish as many monsters on the field as possible, except the monster(s) with the highest Level, and if you do, face-up monsters on the field that were not banished by this effect are unaffected by card effects, except their own, until the end of this turn. If a DARK Dragon Synchro Monster is Synchro Summoned to your field while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Red Rain" once per turn.
